title: Boris Johnson continued a trip to Scotland despite an official testing positive for Covid-19
content:
1. Boris Johnson continued a trip to Scotland despite an official testing positive for Covid-19  CNN
  2. No apology from Boris Johnson over Thatcher coal mine closures remark  BBC News
  3. Anger as Boris Johnson does not isolate after staffer’s positive Covid test  The Guardian
  4. Boris Johnson has unleashed the ghost of Margaret Thatcher – and frightened off potential voters | Andrew Grice  The Independent
  5. Unspun: Starmer's Cambo oilfield opposition puts Sturgeon and Johnson to shame  HeraldScotland
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
